title: $:/litClock/times/-20:30-Agatha Christie
quote_first: Alix took up a piece of needlework and began to stitch. Gerald read a few pages of his book. Then he glanced up at the clock and tossed the book away. “
quote_last: . Time to go down to the cellar and start work."

title: $:/litClock/times/-20:30-Patrick Kavanagh
quote_first: The bicycles go by in twos and threes - there’s a dance on in Billy Brennan’s barn tonight, and there’s the half-talk code of mysteries and the wink-and-elbow language of delight.
quote_last: and there is not a spot upon a mile of road, no shadow thrown that might turn out a man or woman,
